strapiPost.title: NWA Program Offering Healthcare Education & Career Assistance
strapiPost.content:
Excellerate Foundation and Walton Family Foundation have joined forces with local academic institutions and major employers in Northwest Arkansas to create opportunities for local residents to succeed in the healthcare field. 

  • Into the field: Upskill NWA is a program to assist people with lower incomes who have a desire for a healthcare career. Opportunities through Upskill NWA include academic, career, and financial assistance.
  • Community support: The program is supported by and in collaboration with multiple like-minded entities throughout the community, allowing for services such as tuition, books, transportation, and childcare to be provided at no cost to participants. Success is ensured by Upskill NWA Career Navigators walks with participants every step of the way.

Learn more and apply HERE.
